actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets act of 1968 to assist States and local governments to improve the accuracy, timeliness, and completeness of criminal justice information.
short_title: Criminal Justice Information Improvement Act of 1987
subjects: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies

summary.text: Criminal Justice Information Improvement Act of 1987 - Amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to establish a grant program to assist State and local governments to improve the accuracy, timeliness, and completeness of criminal justice information. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1988 through 1992.

titles.title: Criminal Justice Information Improvement Act of 1987
A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets act of 1968 to assist States and local governments to improve the accuracy, timeliness, and completeness of criminal justice information.
